about.title: About ReceitAI
about.content: ReceitAI is an AI-powered meal planning application that generates personalized recipes based on your dietary preferences and goals.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using ReceitAI, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

items.oauth: You must sign in using Google or Apple authentication
items.age: You must be at least 16 years old to use this service
items.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
items.accuracy: You must provide accurate dietary restriction information

items.mealPlanning: Meal planning tools (weekly plans, family calendar, special events)

items.freeTier: Free tier: 15 AI-generated recipes per week

aiDisclaimer.title: AI-Generated Content Disclaimer
aiDisclaimer.important: IMPORTANT: Recipes are generated by artificial intelligence (Google Vertex AI).

items.accuracy: We do NOT guarantee nutritional accuracy of generated recipes
items.allergies: We do NOT guarantee that recipes are safe for your specific allergies
items.verify: You MUST verify all ingredients before consuming any recipe
items.risk: You use recipes entirely at your own risk
items.liability: We are not responsible for any adverse reactions to recipes

items.accurate: Provide accurate dietary restrictions and allergy information
items.verify: Verify recipe ingredients before preparation and consumption
items.medical: Not rely solely on ReceitAI for medical dietary needs
items.misuse: Not misuse or abuse the service
items.limits: Not attempt to circumvent usage limits

items.personal: Generated recipes are provided for your personal, non-commercial use
items.share: You may save and share recipes for personal purposes
items.ownership: The ReceitAI application, design, and code remain our property
items.copy: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our application

items.asIs: ReceitAI is provided "as is" without warranties

items.delete: You may delete your account at any time

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, ReceitAI and its operators shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.content: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. We will notify users of significant changes.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by applicable law in your jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how ReceitAI collects, uses, and protects your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable privacy laws.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legalBasis.intro: We process your data based on:

contract.label: Contract
contract.desc: To provide the meal planning service you requested

consent.label: Consent
consent.desc: For optional features (you can withdraw anytime)

legitimate.label: Legitimate Interest
legitimate.desc: To improve and secure our service

items.save: Save your meal plans and preferences
items.language: Provide the service in your preferred language

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.location: Data is processed in the United States (Google Cloud region: us-central1).
thirdParty.euUsers: For EU users: Google LLC complies with the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework.

items.active: Active accounts: Data retained while your account is active
items.deleted: Deleted accounts: Data deleted within 30 days of account deletion
items.tokens: Revoked auth tokens: Deleted after expiration

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)

access.label: Access
access.desc: View your personal data through the app settings

rectification.label: Rectification
rectification.desc: Update your information at any time

erasure.label: Erasure
erasure.desc: Request deletion of your account and data

portability.label: Portability
portability.desc: Request a copy of your data

restriction.label: Restriction
restriction.desc: Request we limit processing of your data

objection.label: Objection
objection.desc: Object to processing based on legitimate interest

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

items.tokens: Authentication tokens (to keep you logged in)

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: ReceitAI is not intended for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data is stored and processed in the United States using Google Cloud services. For EU users, appropriate safeguards are in place under the EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes via the app or email. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

contact.title: Contact & Complaints
contact.content: For privacy questions or to exercise your rights:
contact.euComplaint: EU users may also lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.
